info.author: Leo Breebaart
info.description:
Tidybot traverses one or more source directories, and
runs all HTML files it finds through the TidyLib
checker, collecting all warnings and errors it
encounters and presenting them nicely in an XHTML
report. It is possible to specify files/directories to
exclude from the checks, warnings/errors to suppress in
the generated report, and 'key:value' options to pass
directly to the underlying TidyLib engine. The
generated report can use a custom CSS stylesheet.
Tidybot has both a command-line interface and a GUI.
info.name: tidybot
info.html_description: Tidybot traverses one or more source directories, and runs all HTML files it finds through the TidyLib checker, collecting all warnings and errors it encounters and presenting them nicely in an XHTML report. It is possible to specify files/directories to exclude from the checks, warnings/errors to suppress in the generated report, and ‘key:value’ options to pass directly to the underlying TidyLib engine. The generated report can use a custom CSS stylesheet. Tidybot has both a command-line interface and a GUI.
